## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3d8c46b66a30d5f77349bdbe5c55b3412346a1b9ee26009a3ee535cdcf1e1677)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'amcharts-accessibility-plugin' @ 99.3.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
